Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.Implementations

package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.Implementations
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DrawInitialCards
    Represents the game state where players draw initial cards during the setup phase.
    MainLoop
    Represents the main loop state in the game, where players take turns to place cards and draw new cards.
    This state implements the GameState interface and defines methods to handle actions during the main gameplay loop.
    ObjectivesSetup
    Represents the setup state where players select their secret objectives.
    PlaceStarterCard
    Represents the initial setup state in the game, where players receive their starting cards and choose their colors.
    This state implements the GameState interface and handles starter card distribution and placement, initial card draws and player color selection.
